createAndFillJobDir(dvar_1=None, dvar_2=None)¶
createJobDirStructure()¶

super(FisherJobSubmitter, self).createJobDirStructure() combos = list(itertools.combinations_with_replacement(

self.phys_pars.free_physical_parameters.keys(), 2))

for dvar_1, dvar_2 in combos:

self.createAndFillJobDir(dvar_1=dvar_1, dvar_2=dvar_2)
